name: Roy Tang
text: Actually, I think I'll remove #2, since I want to know what people think, rather than what they know (most people will not have first-hand information)

source_obj.text: Actually, I think I'll remove #2, since I want to know what people think, rather than what they know (most people will not have first-hand information)

replies.text: In that case, my answer definitely should not count. Good survey, though.
